archimate:Device.name: Nutanix 1
archimate:Device.documentation:
Nutanix NX-3260-G4, NX-3360-G4: Hyperconverged appliances - in the case of Nutanix - natively converge compute + storage to form a single node used in our appliance.
The compute configuration item contains CPUs, memory and network fabrics.
The storage configuration item contains SDD en HDD - hybride or all flash.
